total_hours.description: Total hours tracked for the project within the data range

uninvoiced_hours.description: Total hours yet to be invoiced for the project within the data range

uninvoiced_expenses.description: Total expenses yet to be invoiced for the project within the data range

uninvoiced_amount.description: Total amount yet to be invoiced for the project within the data range

from.description: Start date for the data range

to.description: End date for the data range
